title: AASQ Callout: Ask FSA anything about super compact gearing & ultra-short cranks for gravel
content:
Wondering why you’d want ultra-compact gearing for your gravel bike? Or whether crank arm lengths as short as 145mm will improve your cadence…or aerodynamics? Now’s your chance to ask Full Speed Ahead anything you want about either, so you can get your offroad adventure bike, gravel race bike, or bikepacking/touring bike ready for its next […]

The post AASQ Callout: Ask FSA anything about super compact gearing & ultra-short cranks for gravel appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Jessie-May Morgan
